recipe_name: Carrot and watercress salad with tomatoes
author: Phil Vickery
method: Mix the carrots, watercress and tomatoes together in a bowl.  In a small bowl, whisk together the red wine vinegar and olive oil and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Drizzle over the salad and toss well to coat. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 carrots, peeled and grated,  1 handful watercress, roughly chopped,  3 mi-cuit (semi-dried) tomatoes, in oil, cut in half,  1 tbsp red wine vinegar,  3 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
